mapper.sql: detection_point_id, project_id, detection_type_id, detection_latitude, detection_longitude, detection_name, detection_description
mapper.select: select dp.*, sd.item_name 'item_name' from detection_point dp, sys_dictionary sd where project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and detection_type_id = dic_id

select
from detection_point where project_id = (select project_id from project where project_name = '${_parameter.param1}') and detection_name like '%${_parameter.param2}%'

select dp.*, sd.item_name 'item_name' from detection_point dp, sys_dictionary sd where dp.project_id = (select project_id from project where project_name = '${_parameter.projectName}') and dp.detection_type_id = sd.dic_id order by dp.detection_point_id desc

SELECT sd.item_name 'item_name', sd.item_value 'item_value', dp.project_id, dp.detection_type_id FROM detection_point dp, sys_dictionary sd WHERE dp.detection_type_id = sd.dic_id AND dp.project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY detection_type_id

SELECT dp.*, ld.* FROM ( detection_point dp RIGHT JOIN sensor_info si ON dp.detection_point_id = si.detection_point_id ) RIGHT JOIN laser_data ld ON ld.sensor_id = si.sensor_id WHERE dp.project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND dp.detection_type_id = #{detectionTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and ld.current_times like concat(#{currentTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') GROUP BY dp.detection_name ASC, ld.current_times

SELECT dpt.*, data_total.* FROM detection_point dpt, ( SELECT max_and_min.*, begin_and_end.* FROM ( SELECT begin_data.begin_id AS bl_id, begin_data.begin_time AS bl_time, begin_data.begin_current_data AS begin_current_datas, begin_data.begin_current_laser_change AS begin_current_laser_changes, begin_data.begin_total_laser_change AS begin_total_laser_changes, begin_data.begin_speed_change AS begin_speed_changes, last_data.last_current_data AS end_current_data, last_data.last_current_laser_change AS end_current_laser_change, last_data.last_total_laser_change AS end_total_laser_change, last_data.last_speed_change AS end_speed_change FROM ( SELECT ldd.sensor_id AS begin_id, ldd.current_times AS begin_time, ldd.current_data AS begin_current_data, ldd.current_laser_change AS begin_current_laser_change, ldd.total_laser_change AS begin_total_laser_change, ldd.speed_change AS begin_speed_change FROM laser_data ldd, ( SELECT min(ld.id) AS begin_data_time FROM ( detection_point dp LEFT JOIN sensor_info si ON dp.detection_point_id = si.detection_point_id ) LEFT JOIN laser_data ld ON ld.sensor_id = si.sensor_id WHERE dp.project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND dp.detection_type_id = #{detectionTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( ld.current_times, '%y-%b-%d' ), ld.sensor_id ) AS lsdt WHERE lsdt.begin_data_time = ldd.id ORDER BY ldd.sensor_id ) AS begin_data, ( SELECT ldd.sensor_id AS last_id, ldd.current_times AS last_time, ldd.current_data AS last_current_data, ldd.current_laser_change AS last_current_laser_change, ldd.total_laser_change AS last_total_laser_change, ldd.speed_change AS last_speed_change FROM laser_data ldd, ( SELECT max(ld.id) AS last_data_time FROM ( detection_point dp LEFT JOIN sensor_info si ON dp.detection_point_id = si.detection_point_id ) LEFT JOIN laser_data ld ON ld.sensor_id = si.sensor_id WHERE dp.project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND dp.detection_type_id = #{detectionTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( ld.current_times, '%y-%b-%d' ), ld.sensor_id ) AS lsdt WHERE lsdt.last_data_time = ldd.id ORDER BY ldd.sensor_id ) AS last_data WHERE begin_data.begin_id = last_data.last_id AND DATE_FORMAT( begin_data.begin_time, '%y-%b-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( last_data.last_time, '%y-%b-%d' ) ) AS begin_and_end, ( SELECT dpp.detection_point_id AS detection_ids, max(lddd.current_data) AS max_current_data, max(lddd.total_laser_change) AS max_total_laser_change, max(lddd.current_laser_change) AS max_current_laser_change, max(lddd.speed_change) AS max_speed_change, min(lddd.current_data) AS min_current_data, min(lddd.total_laser_change) AS min_total_laser_change, min(lddd.current_laser_change) AS min_current_laser_change, min(lddd.speed_change) AS min_speed_change, lddd.sensor_id, lddd.current_times FROM ( detection_point dpp LEFT JOIN sensor_info sii ON sii.detection_point_id = dpp.detection_point_id ) LEFT JOIN laser_data lddd ON lddd.sensor_id = sii.sensor_id WHERE dpp.project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND dpp.detection_type_id = #{detectionTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( lddd.current_times, '%y-%b-%d' ), lddd.sensor_id ) AS max_and_min WHERE max_and_min.sensor_id = begin_and_end.bl_id AND DATE_FORMAT( max_and_min.current_times, '%y-%b-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( begin_and_end.bl_time, '%y-%b-%d' ) ) AS data_total WHERE data_total.detection_ids = dpt.detection_point_id ORDER BY data_total.current_times
mapper.insert: insert into detection_point (detection_point_id, project_id, detection_type_id, detection_latitude, detection_longitude, detection_name, detection_description) values (#{detectionPointId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{detectionTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{detectionLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detectionLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detectionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detectionDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into detection_point
detection_point_id,
project_id,
detection_type_id,
detection_latitude,
detection_longitude,
detection_name,
detection_description,
#{detectionPointId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{detectionTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{detectionLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{detectionLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{detectionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{detectionDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update detection_point
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
detection_type_id = #{detectionTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
detection_latitude = #{detectionLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
detection_longitude = #{detectionLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
detection_name = #{detectionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
detection_description = #{detectionDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where detection_point_id = #{detectionPointId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update detection_point set project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, detection_type_id = #{detectionTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, detection_latitude = #{detectionLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detection_longitude = #{detectionLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detection_name = #{detectionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detection_description = #{detectionDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where detection_point_id = #{detectionPointId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
